panels.description: The average number of records consumed per second.
panels.title: Consumer records consumed rate

panels.description: The average number of records sent per second.
panels.title: Producer record send rate

panels.description: The average number of bytes consumed per second.
panels.title: Consumer incoming byte rate

panels.description: The average number of outgoing bytes sent per second to all servers.
panels.title: Producer outgoing byte rate

panels.description: The maximum lag in terms of number of records for any partition in this window. An increasing value over time is your best indication that the consumer group is not keeping up with the producers.
panels.title: Consumer lag max

panels.description: The number of fetch requests per second.
panels.title: Consumer fetch request rate

panels.description: time taken for a group rejoin
panels.title: Producer dropped message rate

panels.description: The average and max request latency in ms.
panels.title: Consumer fetch request latency

panels.description: The average number of outgoing bytes sent per second to all servers.
panels.title: Produce request rate

panels.description: The average and max request latency in ms.
panels.title: Consume request latency per node

panels.description: The average and max request latency in ms.
panels.title: Produce request latency average

panels.description: The average and max request latency in ms.
panels.title: Produce request latency average (producer -> broker node)

panels.description: time taken for a group rejoin
panels.title: Consumer Group Join Time

panels.description: The current number of in-flight requests awaiting a response.
panels.title: Producer requests in flight

panels.description: The number of commit calls per second
panels.title: Consumer commit rate per host

panels.description: The total amount of buffer memory that is not being used (either unallocated or in the free list).
panels.title: Producer buffer % used

panels.description: The average per-second number of record sends that resulted in errors or retries.
panels.title: Producer record retry & error rate

panels.description: The average per-second number of record sends that are dropped due to buffer exhaustion
panels.title: Produce buffer exhausted rate
